name: CLUNK 2
description:
Welcome to the epic saga of Clunk. 

Control the two little magnet buddies Clunker and Chonker, and lead them through a hazardous maze of obstacles using the magical power of friendship. (And electromagnetism. Mostly electromagnetism). 

Your goal is to connect the two separated friends, finally letting them join together again.

Clunk 2: Magnetic Boogaloo and all it’s art, music and code were created entirely within the GMTK GameJam 2021’s 48 hour period.

  • Art & Design by Michael Rizzi
  • Programming & Composing by Sebastian Drews
